subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Biathlon
lead_paragraph: Several high-powered Russian tycoons, including the Nets owner Mikhail D. Prokhorov, have lent their expertise and money to winter sports teams in anticipation of the Winter Olympics.
snippet: Several high-powered Russian tycoons, including the Nets owner Mikhail D. Prokhorov, have lent their expertise and money to winter sports teams in anticipation of the Winter Olympics.
